file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-10-07 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE II (LOWER SIDE) - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE II (LOWER SIDE) - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the EWIS components, lines and floor beams in the center fuselage II, lower side. B. Zones: 141/142. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER ALL 05-40-10-100-801-A ♦ FUSELAGE II (LOWER SIDE) - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-10 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-10-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE II (LOWER SIDE) - CLEANING A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-140-007-A00. (3) You must clean the EWIS components, lines and floor beams, at center fuselage II, zones 141/142. (4) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wiring and components, during the cleaning procedure. (5) Do not disconnect electrical connectors, during the cleaning procedures. If contamination is found, clean only the exposed areas. (6) Refer to the preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400 - WM 20-21-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 141 Passenger cabin - LH 142 Passenger cabin - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Vacuum cleaner To clean the area EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-10 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Cloth, Lint-Free To clean the area AR available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage II - lower side I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Identify the passenger-cabin floor panels of center fuselage II, at sub-zone 240 (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100) that give access to zones 141/142. (2) Remove the passenger-cabin floor panels from center fuselage II at sub-zone 240 to access zones 141/142. Refer to AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-801-A/400 (applicable to EMB-140 and EMB-145 models) or AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400 (applicable to EMB-135 model). (3) Remove, if necessary, the thermoacoustic insulation from center fuselage II, at zones 141/142 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400, as applicable). J. EWIS Components in the Center Fuselage II (Lower Side) - Cleaning (Figure 701) (Figure 702) SUBTASK 160-002-A (1) The cleaning procedure given by this task is applicable to the specified components or assemblies of an area/zone. (2) Do the cleaning procedure as follows: (a) Use a vacuum cleaner and/or clean and dry cloth to remove the particles from the area under passenger cabin floor, lines and floor beams. (b) If contamination is found, clean the EWIS components. Refer to WM 20-21-00, Section Cleaning Procedures. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) If the thermoacoustic insulation was previously removed, install it at zones 141/142 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400), as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-10 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Install the passenger-cabin floor panels to center fuselage II, at sub-zone 240 related to zones 141/142. Refer to AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-801-A/400 (applicable to EMB-140 and EMB-145 models) or AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400 (applicable to EMB-135 model).
